testcase.classname: Search and place order for vegetables
testcase.name: Search for items and validate results
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Green cart Landing page....................................passed When User searched for Cucumber vegetable...................................passed Then "Cucumber" results are displayed.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Search and place order for vegetables
testcase.name: Search for items and then move to checkout page
